Olley Tsino Maruma (nwụrụ n'afọ 2010) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Zimbabwe
O so na ndị isi ojii ole na ole mgbe nnwere onwe mba ahụ gasịrị n'afọ 1980 iji nwee ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe. A na-eto ya maka uto na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mba Zimbabwe.

Mgbe ọ nọ n'England, ọ gara Mahadum Kent na Canterbury ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma jiri BA Honours na Iwu, nweta Ọzụzụ Mmepụta Television na Ngalaba Mgbasa Ozi nke British Council na London ma bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na BBC's Current Affairs Television Programme, Out of Court
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ọkara akụkọ ndụ banyere afọ ndị a chụpụgara ya n'agha na nlọghachi ya na Zimbabwe nke a na-akpọ, Coming Home nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2007. Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2010.
